structure.unit: Administrative Provisions Relative To State Taxation

law.catch_line: Report Of Gross Receipts By Taxpayers Subject To Chapter 63 A; Computation Of Tax
law.text: Every taxpayer subject to taxation under chapter sixty-three A shall on or before April fifteenth of each year make a return to the commissioner of the total amount of its gross receipts for the preceding calendar year and compute the amount of the tax prescribed by section two of chapter sixty-three A.
